channel.title: Changing Intro Music (508)
channel.description: Hello. When I start my client, the intro automatically plays. How do I make to where the volume for it automaticaly starts with 0 everytime the client is started?

item.title: Changing Intro Music (508)

item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

Hello. When I start my client, the intro automatically plays. How do I make to where the volume for it automaticaly starts with 0 everytime the client is started?

Read full topic
